resources.string: A modplayer that plays over 90 mainstream and obscure module formats, including Protracker (MOD), Scream Tracker 3 (S3M), Fast Tracker II (XM) and Impulse Tracker (IT).
The directory where mod files are located

• Better sound quality
• Add support to IT sample vibrato
• Fix IT event reading
• Fix IT lowpass filter
• Fix mixer resampling
• Fix HSC Adlib instrument conversion
• Update player engine to libxmp 3.9.3
 
Version 3.0.2:
• Add option to display titles in file browser
• Fix crash with zero-length S3M modules
• Fix race condition on interface restart
• Fix crash with certain J2B modules
• Fix IT tremor and retrig effects
• Fix IT global volume setting
• Fix IT stray portamento handling
 
Version 3.0.1:
• Enable view change after returning to player from notification
 
Version 3.0.0:
• New visualization modes
• Persistent loop and shuffle options
• Set module path from file browser
• Fix envelope loops
• Fix IT corner case instrument setting
 
Version 2.9.2:
• Fix note delay effect
• Fix IT virtual channel mapping
• Fix IT instrument cutoff setting
• Fix XM corner case volume setting
• Fix linear periods for very high notes
• Fix pattern number display
• Fix screen update rate
• Add option to keep screen on
 
Version 2.9.1:
• Fix bidirectional sample loops
• Fix "previous" media button handling
• Add reorderable playlists
• Add Protracker effect EFx (Invert loop)
Install example music files when creating modules directory
Play files again after playlist ends
Long press modules to create new playlists or add to existing playlists. Long press playlists for more options.
Using libxmp %s written by Claudio Matsuoka and Hipolito Carraro Jr.

Set the size of sound buffer in milliseconds:
Display file names instead of titles in playlists
Display a menu option to delete the currently playing file
Prevent screen from sleeping during replay
Display titles instead of file names in browser (warning: may be slow)
